definition: The term refers to something that is derived from or related to plants, often used to describe products or substances that are made from or contain plant-based ingredients. It is commonly used in the context of food, medicine, or cosmetics to indicate that the item is of plant origin or suitable for vegetarians and vegans.

examples.german: Pflanzliche Lebensmittel sind gut für die Gesundheit.
examples.english: Plant-based foods are good for health.

examples.german: Ich habe mich für eine pflanzliche Ernährung entschieden.
examples.english: I have chosen a plant-based diet.

examples.german: Diese Creme enthält nur pflanzliche Inhaltsstoffe.
examples.english: This cream contains only plant-based ingredients.

examples.german: Pflanzliche Öle sind eine gesunde Alternative zu tierischen Fetten.
examples.english: Plant-based oils are a healthy alternative to animal fats.
